Name: PetShop
About the game: 'PetShop' is the app that exports dogs, cats, sharks, dolphins, squirrels, turtles, elephants, dragons, and many other animals as pets along with your avatar as VRM files. It is also possible to cosplay animals with animal parts such as ears, tails, wings, and antennae, as well as animal hats. The avatar you create can be exported in VRM format. The exported avatars can be used in VRM compatible metaverse. Join the Metaverse with 'PetShop'! Export VRM avatars The avatar you create can be exported in VRM format. The exported avatars can be used in VRM compatible metaverse. Upload your avatar to 'cluster' or 'Virtual Cast' without any conversion. You can also use it in VRM-compatible games and applications. Japanese＆English supported You can change language English and Japanese in this app. Enjoy! And you can modify the output avatar as you like. For example, you can convert it to FBX and go to VRChat! Join the Metaverse with 'PetShop'! *VRM1.0 is not supported. *If the bone display of the loaded VRM is incorrect, try setting the Graphics Quality to VeryHigh in the Configration box when starting the application. 100 pets & items included Miniature Dachshund / Cat / Reindeer Hat / Monkey Hat / Cicada Hat / Tiger Hat (2 kinds) / Rabbit Ear / Bat / Antler / Cat Ear / Cat Tail / Reindeer Antler / Paw Glove (Right / Left) / Monkey Hand Hat / footballfish Hat / Fox Hat / Fox Tail / Fox / Dragon / Tortoise / Corgi / Bird / Birds' aphids / Marlin / Tanuki ears / Tanuki tail / Butterfly wings / Tentacles / Bee wings / Bee hips / Bee hat / Squirrel / Acorn / Squirrel tail / Bee / Eagle head / Eagle boots (right / left) / Eagle hand (right / left) / Butterfly / Waist cloth / Eagle tail feather / Jellyfish / Jellyfish head / Monkey / Elephant / Pigeon / Bird / Wasp / Cicada / Honeybee (3 types) / Bat / Fish hook / Angel wing / Skull wing / Scallop shell (1 piece) / Turtle / Scallop shell (upper and lower sets) / footballfish / Clione / Octopus foot (1 piece) / Sheep horn / Mimi / Tail (cotton type) / Spiral shell / Duck / Devil tail / Beehive / Fox ears / Flexible devil tail / Lion tail / Bear / Rabbit / Reindeer / Penguin / Cicada / Wings / Giraffe / Zebra / Fox mask / Inari (stone statue) / Cheetah / Flying cat / Cat angel / Zombie bear (including panda) / Zombie rabbit / Octopus / Wig with fox ears / Sheep / Swinging sheep / Alpaca / Mermaid half-body / Lion / Need more option? ◆Avatar Making apps 【AvatarShop】 / 【MUGEN Avatar】 / ◆Add some cute items! 【ItemShop】 / ◆Change other dress with DressMaker series！ *Important* * Underwear avatars only supported by Dressmaker series. * Avatars in other outfits are not supported. i.e. swimwear, school uniform, short pants etc. 【DressMaker Pro】 / 【DressMaker】 /
